name: AppServ
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: AppServ is an Apache, MySQL, PHP, phpMyAdmin installer package for Windows and Linux.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<span class="headd"><strong><big>  The AppServ Open Project - ([^\s]+) for (Windows|Linux) <\/big><\/strong><\/span><\/font><\/td>)
